trans-unit.source: Define the original resource of this page to avoid duplicate content issues.

Specify an uri, which should be set as canonical link. This option is part of search engine optimization (SEO) and helps search engines to correctly rank content which occures more often than once (so called "Dupicate Content").
Canonical link element at Wikipedia | http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canonical_link_element,Duplicate Content at Wikipedia | http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duplicate_content
